entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
